overview: Six-year-old "Mike" goes to live with her pregnant older sister, Babs, who plays string bass in Jos√© Iturbi's orchestra. And the orchestra is rapidly turning completely female, what with the draft. As the orchestra travels around the country, Babs' fellow orchestra members intercept and hide her War Office telegram to protect the baby.
tagline: Warm, Tender Romance! Deep, Lasting Faith!
title: Music for Millions
